summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the development of multi-family housing; creating a new Chapter 5.72 of the Seattle Municipal Code in Title 5 - Taxation and Revenue, Subtitle II - Taxes, implementing RCW Chapter 84.14 to provide for exemption from ad valorem property taxation for qualifying multi-family housing in designated residential target areas within the City and designating certain areas as residential targeted areas; and amending Seattle Municipal Code Section 3.02.125 relating to Hearing Examiner fees.
committee: Housing, Human Services and Civil Rights
